content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: A good friend and myself witnessed a strange sighting in the sky just after sunset on thursday night, while driving back from carter county, tn into sullivan county, tn. we we traveling down chinquapin grove road right around 6 pm. at first i saw them to the left, as i was sitting in passenger seat, but at first it didn't strike me as odd. shortly after that i saw them on my right, just above holston mountain. there appeared to be several of them and it appeared as if they flew in sets of two. one set was traveling side by side, while another set hovered over the mountain, but they were not side by side, one was above the other. they mostly resembled christmas trees and were flashing and they were in the sky and did not have the mountains or trees as their background. each set of two crafts, were not quite the same color. one appeared orangish-red, one appeared bluish-white, for example. we knew they were either suppressed government technology to alien in origin. each one flashed alternately and their position/distance from each other would change, but they flew in twos for the most part. at one time, it seemed like we witnessed three sets on them in different areas of the sky either moving in a path to hovering, but not completely still. other people had to have seen this in the area. we stopped  alongside weaver pike and got out pf the car to get a better look and there was a helicopter with a spotlight coming through the area flowing one of the strange double christmas tree craft. we did see one flying at a low lever and did have the same type of sound that a jet airplane would make, but much softer for the given distance. they were not conventional aircraft, as those would have to have a green light on the right wing and a red one on the left and a white light on the tail. these appeared nothing like that. the whole incident lasted 20-30 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw three maybe four sets of two christmas tree-like lights hovering/flying in various areas

content.detailedDescription: I heard a noise like a loud car when the song was went to the other , i looked out the window because we were on the 6th floor. when i looked i seen the lights right there i said na illbe stupid if i dont record this.
content.summary: I heard a noise like a like a loud car n i looked out the window n seen the lights once i seen that i started recording

content.detailedDescription: I was entering my driveway coming from work. i saw this object shoot straight across my backyard directly in front of me or at least it seemed that way. i was unsure of what the object was. my first thought was that it was alien like as it seemed to come from my neighbors yard to my right and wanted to disappear upon my entrance. however, upon second thought, the object was clearly meteor like in that it had flame and sparks coming off of it. the center of he object was a glowing reflective silver color. the best description would be like a ball of mercury. the object seemed to be very low to the ground and had flames as well as sparks coming from it as it shot swiftly across my yard. my feelings about the siting were as i stated above. i thought it was perhaps an alien ship of some sort but then thought it could be some type of meteor because of the flame and sparks coming from it. the object shot across my yard and seemed to descend as it disappeared behind the tree lines to the left of my position as it came to the end of the trailer park which was just over two trailers to my left. (less than 500 yards).
content.summary: Object flew straight across my backyard

content.detailedDescription: i was walking home and was on my street when i noticed a odd light in the sky gliding in an odd way on december 10th at 11:15 in malden or revere mass.. i am a believer of ufo's and et's. but i firmly believe i am not jumping to conclusions.I watched it fly west then stop and hover. so i walked to my best vantage point possible, by this time it decended straight down. so i was actually starting to think this aint right. so i took my phone out at this point but didn't get anything good on the camera or video recorder.So i'm at the back of a cemateary watching it hover sighlently. i then tried to record it again. my phone was low at 25 % and as soon as i recoreded it again it beeped saying it was low 15% and could not record due to low battery, then totally died and shut off . it useally tells you ten than 5 than makes a noise when it dies , it would usually take mins. this took seconds and did not go through its low battery functions. i proceeded to watch it accend, decend, go west, east and hover in impossible 90 degrees diagonal movements. i was stunned, it has been my dream to see what i saw. i always pictured jumping up and down, but i was astonished and keep saying expletives. i have a solid knowledge of planes and helicopters and air crafts my dad was in the air force, and i'm a sky watcher. no plane could ever move like this, the g force would rip the piolet in half. it made no sound. it was one red and one white light side bye side. i could not make out the craft just two circles like this oo. during this i saw planes, stars, and the i saw what i believe was a large black hawk helicopter, very low appearing to land. which i have seen before. some were over there is a base or airport or something in that general direction. maybe logan. but that is more east and have routinely seen all sorts of crafts go that direction. when it moved it wasn't so fast u couldn't see it but it was fast and stoped on a dime. then i heard what sounded to be a jet or two going that direction but never saw them. then a couple mins later it decended straight down and landed. it was dark and to far away to see it but i swore i saw a red light on the ground. so i tried to get closer two it but the only way was through a forrest and it could have been miles away. i was unarmed and had no flashlight so i did not proceed but i am in the mourning. waited to see if it would go back up for a few mins. it didn't i went home. i don't know if it was et ufo or a government ufo, leaning towards the later. but it was no plane, i don't think a drone it would have to have been like a war drone for that size. hellicopter is possible but no noise and don't think a helicopter could have made these movements...Sorry for the spelling, i'm very excited and had to report this right away..I want to know if anyone else saw it or knows anything about it, or did i just witness something out of this world. ..Thanks
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a ufo that was red and white hover and love side to side up and down and land!

content.detailedDescription:
Kansas city, missouri

every night, from the time i was 2-4 years old, (about 1950-52) i was "visited" nightly by several "beings".  they always "appeared" in my bedroom at night.  always, from  across the room, they would wake me up.   i would feel their presence and would hear them call my name.  after i woke up, they would always take me somewhere and bring or send me back before sunrise.   they always spoke to me without moving their lips.     

the most memorable one was one that i called "the little guy", because he was a tiny bit taller than me.  he always talked to me without moving his lips.  as a child, i didn't understand how i could hear him so clear without him "talking".   

at that time in my life, we lived in an apartment, on the second floor.  we had a multi-frequency, long ranged radio that sat cater-corner in the dining room.  i think it was a philips or philco. (which i still have in my possession).    every night i would go to the bathroom, somewhere about 2-5 am-ish.  he would always step from behind the radio.  then we would always exit by going down, like it was a hole in the floor or like the floor wasn't even there.  i have fleeting memories of sitting while he talked to me.  (without moving his lips)  :-)   he taught me and "showed" me "how our quadrant of the "uni-verse" was formed", logic, mind over matter, how "everything" was alive or had "life" and so much more. 
as a child, i didn't fully understand the full meaning of "everything" having life !!!   so, i took it literally,
and would talk to everything, dolls, pencils, plates, furniture, etc.   (i now "over-stand" the concept.  "everything " is made of atoms and atoms are the core of all things..... therefore everything has "life").   
   
at four years old, i was telling the adults in my family about how my older sister could use "logic and "mind over matter" to get rid of her headache that had her screaming from the pain.   his "visits" continued for years, until i was about 9 or 10 years old.  

he was my height and looked humanoid, but he had a cone-shaped, hairless head.  his skin color was light brownish.    

it was the last "visit" from a being that i called "the lady", that caused me to ask them all to stop coming to me.  ( i thought "the lady" was my aunt, who was still living).   late one night, as usual, 
"the lady" appeared across my bedroom, like she always did.  this time she asked me to follow her down the hallway, to the living room.  (she, too, always talked to me without moving her lips).  when i got to the living room, she told me to straighten the rug that we kept in the center of the room.  this was significant because this rug was soft and very flexible. therefore was a major chore for us little children to keep it straight and it usually took myself, my older sister and my younger brother to accomplish this task.   soooooo, with her urging and encouragement, i walked to the center of the rug, straightened all four corners.  i walked back to the edge, off the rug, turned around, thinking i would be in trouble for messing up the rug.   when i looked at the rug, it was smooth as glass and i was in shock.  then she told me to place a newspaper in the center and to put a framed picture on top.  once again, the rug was smooth as glass..... not a wrinkle in sight.   i was amazed!!!   and confused!!!   i turn around to ask her "why", but she had just vanished!!!   she was wearing a beautiful light pink full length formal gown, like she aways wore, and had brownish skin tone. 

i went through the house looking for her and saw my mother, who was sitting at the dining room table.
she questioned me and i told her i was looking for aunt nette.  (my mothers younger sister).  mom said that aunt nette wasn't there.   but i insisted that she had just been in the living room with me.  mom looked in the living room and there was the perfectly straight rug with the newspaper and the framed picture in the center.   that didn't make her believe me though.    the next day mom took me to the doctor, who told my mother that i was hallucinating and that i had a fever.   :-(

for years i was teased by siblings and cousins to the point that i would go hide somewhere and cry.
i felt unhappy, confused, "different", like a freak and ashamed.  i couldn't understand how they could be "not real" when i had spent so many years being "taken" by them every night, learning from them and coming back just before the family awakened in the mornings.  even though i couldn't wrap my brain around the "hallucination" thing, i was then confused about the reality of my "visiting friends".
so, i asked them to stop coming to me.    

sooooooo, needless to say, i never told my family or any one else about "the little guy" or any of the "other" beings that visited me at nights!!!!  

i now believe that there was a portal in that apartment that led them to me.   i'm still searching for the purpose. i never saw a space ship.  only those beings, standing in my room.  sometimes there was 3 -5 beings.  other times it was just "the lady".   
 
maybe the purpose was for me to share with others like others have shared thru mufon.  i feel like it's time for me to tell my story.  i've been hiding waaaaay to long.   

i'm convinced that these beings were from another planet or planetary system, somewhere in the
 "uni-verse" and they wanted me to know that they are real so i could help others!!!
content.summary: In the early 50's, beings visited me every night, for many years when i was a child an took me to teach me.

content.detailedDescription: I always check the stars when we have a clear night first thought it was a falling star but it danced up and down side to side hovering above tree top level, no sounds heard so i decided to keep watching it cause it was unusual watched for a good half hour then it just disappeared, earlier in the spring there was a bright light shining  in the field behind my house i thought it was a spot light shinning but it was extra bright so i went outside then it just went up and was gone.
content.summary: White flickering star like with occasional red blinking went up down side to side hovering in same spot

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my dog behind my house.It was very dark the i saw a very bright light as it game closer i saw pulsating lights then it stop and hovered i also heard humming. it was stationary at first then it zoomed in a zig zag pattern. i felt slightly light headed after and found my self with  uncontrollably nausea . it zoomed away .
content.summary: It was very dark the i saw a very bright light as it game closer i saw pulsating lights then it stop and hovered i also heard humming.

content.detailedDescription: Having coffee on my deck at about 5:40 am. i observed an object rising up some distance out over the ocean. the object was rising slowly and pulsating. it began to ascend at an increasing rate, and as it did it started pulsating faster. the glowing increased the higher it climbed. then, in a sudden flash, it shot directly upward in an indescribable acceleration only to disappear.
content.summary: Ascent over pacific ocean

content.detailedDescription:
I was reviewing my security system 12-5-15 and observed ball of light slowly descending in the drivway camera.Astonished i watched it stop and hover about 2' above the drivway and slowly move towards the house. quickly i switched to the house camara witch shows my truck parked and a car parked next to it with a person unloading groceries. the object, ball of light passed behind the person unloading groceries and up over truck bed. then along the rear window of the truck then rose and circled back and hovered about 6" over truck body cover. then suddenly rose up and past the house camara changing shape. can see oblong reflection in rear glass of truck window in a freeze frame. also observed movement coisides with person not looking or upper body is in the car. going to attach small portion and pics but unable to upload all ay once. file footage too much i guess. welcome to contact! i am truly stumped. ruled out,drone,bug,bird,bat upon freezing frame by frame and zooming. thirty five frames a second. not able to transfer off hard drive to zip drive. can't figure it out! will be overwritten and lost in a couple of days if i can't find help. the attached photos
video is my cell phone of the television while playing sec system.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light slowly descended into security camera, lowered,hovered and moved toward hous,passed behind a personapprox18". then rose up over truck body,along truck rear window. went up and small circle back then hovered over bimity top on truck bed. then bolted

content.detailedDescription: 12/3/15 between 7:30 and 8 pm my father called and told me that upon arriving home he had seen a very large object in the sky headed towards my direction. he said at first he thought it was a blimp and made a low humming sound. but due to its size and outline he said it wasn't a blimp. so along with my 7 year old son i stepped outside to see if i too could see it. i did! it was massive! it moved too slowly to be a plane and went in a straight line. it had 5 very bright lights. 2 on either side, one in front. the lights on either side were very very bright therefore letting me see a triangular type outline. the lights did not blink, just very bright. it moved over my house then disappeared in the distance nw. we checked to see if any blimps or planes were in our area that night and there were none. also on 12/4/2015 while riding with my father on hwy 13 at dusk around 5:15 pm north out of town we both saw a very bright star like object sitting stationary in the north eastern sky. while watching it another light seemed to intersect with it and disappear. almost as if it entered the brighter object. after it "entered" within a few seconds the lights disappeared. very strange lights and happenings occur in this area yearly at about this same time. december seems to be a great time to see ufo's here.
content.summary: 12/3 very large width! dark trianglish shape! heard a low hum! moved very, very slowly.Very bright lights on bottom.Next day 12/4 saw a shiny starlike object in the northern sky. while watching anothersmaller light seemed to intersect with the object.

content.detailedDescription: Walking dog looked up at stars and a blue tube took off from a stand still in south kansas city 12-8-15 @ 7:30pm. this did not look like any regular aircraft.
content.summary: Blue tube shape light took off from stand still moving towards pace 3-4 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I have been watching if i files.  these incidents do not compare to what i've been thru.  i've been affected since living on a farm in troutville pa.  my grandpa had a working animal and many acres of gardens.  my first recollection was a circle cut down in the corn field he blamed the amish,they wanted his property,and hated them forever after. they now own the farm.
i've had 2 children removed from me, i've had jobs taken from me when trying to make reports,accused of taking drugs. hospital records vanish.  my right hand partially removed from damage from the lights.  something done to my youngest boy,that's now at 16 started having seizures.  been followed,been diagnosed with a rare blood disease that only my aunt has ever had.  i've been given knowledge i don't want.  i don't want contacted,bad things occur.  i know why they are here,i know when they started coming,i know things i have no way of knowing that are so complex it's crazy.  i've been subjected to this since i remember.  the memories come and go,but never leave for good.  my family,friends or priest don't even know. i've lived to doctors about injuries sustained.  i have a piece of rock that was changed after an incident,when my hand was damaged.  i had needles stuck in my wrist.  my youngest child is being used for something i can't even explain to him.  my husband,who was policeman of the year in 2012 his entire memory was erased and lost his job,the doctors could find nothing wrong and diagnosed him with ptsd,which is carp.  we lost properties we owned and rented.  when i watch that show and people talk about seeing lights,i'd trade places in a heartbeat.  there are tunnels underground,under water and people know about them, people i think related to scientology and mormons.  mercury is what they want,not gold,they can make gold.  it is stored underground in asia,china to be exact i think.  the agenda is almost hitler like,in the sense they are and have been for a long time preparing a most useful race.  i was tested at an early age with an extremely high iq.  i don't know if that's why i'm targeted.  but i will continue to be targeted,because of my son.  when he's 21, i will be taken or disposed of.  i tell my kids if anything happens to me,they will always be able to talk to me by looking at orion and i will hear them.  i know that,don't know why because i converted to catholic to try to end this.  if this gets to you, i will be frightened by people who will stop me and make me nuts.  to the point that if i don't stop something tragic will happen,like every other time.  but they are preparing us and our planet and themselves,because our world is as close to theirs as there found. their technology is advancing rapidly,faster even then ours.  they have many vehicles with which they travel. the large ones carry many of them to show their people what their world will be.  they first have to be adaptable to all portions of our planet,so they can utilize all of it.  our planet is smaller and our sun will last long.  theirs is dying.
you will not get to the truth because people willing to tell you will suffer,as will their families.  they have 2 of my offspring and have done something to my child.  he's different,i don't know why.  we won't know.  they will have all of our dna and we will and are willingly giving it.  they are evolving us much faster than regular evolution happens and have been for tens of thousands of years.  they don't share our spirit,our personalities,our "souls". they want to have that and they want to feel things like us.  they have brains like an octopus has but live ages longer.
content.summary: I'm just putting in any answers. i have tried to report these things and has not gone well.  i've been physically,professionally and mentally affected.

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing in front of my house with my best friend at about 7pm when we noticed a disk shaped object about 2 to 3 stories high with multi colered lights flashing in sequence travel from the south west to the north east over northern blvd in flushing queens it went directly over a burger king restaurant and the sarivan dinner locatated on the north east corner of northern blvd and 146 street there was a group of neighborhood teens hanging around in the sarivan parking lot and they also saw the craft 
it was moving very slowly and took about 5 minutes to travel 10 blocks 
we lived in the area not far from shea stadium and laguardia air port we saw plans and blimps on a regular basses and this object was neither 
i was some where around 9 or 10 years old at the time and have never seen anything like it again or have not been able to forget it
i am reporting this now to see if anyone else experienced this event like i said it is a heavily populated area and me , my best friend and a hand full of teens can't be the only witnesses 
it was definitely the summer because we were on summer brake either 1976 or 1977 was the year
content.summary: Saw a large craft in a heavily populated area

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were headed home from basketball practice one evening. it was in the fall of 1991 and it was a cool day and very overcast. we had a bad practice, so we were not talking and were basically sulking. we did not have the radio on and were just riding in silence. we were approaching the local lake and was crossing the land dike and as we were crossing the bridge, we both found ourselves looking up and to the left of our vehicle. for some reason we were stopped, or at least driving at a walking pace. we saw the vessel and is was about 50 feet from us and about 50 feet up from us. it was shaped like a triangle with rounded corners. it appeared to be around 3-5 feet thick, it was dark gray with a pattern that appeared tile like. there was a circular light in each corner on the bottom of the craft. as i said earlier, we were riding in silence, this dude was within 50 feet of us and it was totally silent. it seemed soon after we really focused on it, it flew over us, up the lake, over the trees and made a bank to the right, turned up and was gone. so from the location of hovering to out of site was about 1/4-1/2 mile and it took less than 2 seconds. that was simply amazing. as it was going away from us, the back was covered with a green band of light which was rectangular and covered about 90% of the back end of the craft. still, no sound. as the light disappeared over the horizon, the next memory i have is "snapping out of it" about 2 miles down the road. i suddenly realized that i was driving, but i had no recollection of how i got there from the sighting location. as for my buddy, he will not even discuss the event with me, to this day...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Within 50 feet of a silent hovering craft. loss of time followed

content.detailedDescription:
In  approximately august of 1967 i was stationed at malmstrom afb with duty station at an outlying missile site.
one evening i was off duty so decided to look at the stars. i was laying in the bed of a pickup truck and almost immediately noticed a light move from
one "star"  to a neighboring "star". after a few minutes the light returned
to the original "star".  as i watched i saw the light travel back and forth
between the "stars" several times.
since i had decided to leave the af after 14 years i did not tell anyone
of this event as i did not want any thing to interfere with my impending discharge.
content.summary: Interaction between stars

content.detailedDescription:
It was between 4:00 4:30 in the afternoon, i was cleaning my pool as usual & my son was with me in helping out. my  neighbor has a huge tree  to the left of me which drop leaves in the pool , as the leaves where dropping i looked up to the nw & i saw this v shape object flying very slow in one straight line, the v shape point was pointed down as it was moving. now this is the interesteding part of this thing, the lines of this v shape object had these different size square cubes & reflecting light on each other & it sparkled white, this object or what ever it was had a color pink / rose in color almost copper looking. both my son & i where looking at this object moving in a slow straight path & we could not figure what it was. now you guys might say it was  balloons, at first i thought they where, but! these where perfect squares of different size cubes where stationary & yes i've seen balloons up in the air & moving back & forth from the wind currents. i live in the san fernando valley & lived here all my life & yes there is burbank airport & whiteman air port &'i've seen many planes &  helicopters & know the speed as they travel in the skies. i'm a tile contractor & used to being very detail in my work that's my job & that is what i saw.
 i saw another objects at night  to the se at night which the speed was  not a plane or helicopter or a drone. it turned solid green , solid red , & then white & stayed  white! & it bolted with high speed the the south with the object pulsating in white in this situation my mom was with me as i stroll her at night in her wheel chair & we both saw this. there is no reason for me to make this up!
content.summary: V shape ship moving slow nw

content.detailedDescription:
I was a security officer at a coal mine. i went off patrol to sleep. i was awakened by bright lights shining through the passenger window. when i spun my unit around there was nothing there. but that wasn't the disturbing thing. there was no road where the thing had been, and it was nearly straight down into a gulch. in order for that thing to have shown lights into my window it would have had to be hovering about 30-40 feet off the ground. 
i never reported it because i was off patrol grid and sleeping on duty. i was very disturbed over this incident and never slept on guard duty again!
content.summary: I was parked off patrol grid sleeping  was awakened by bright light

content.detailedDescription: 8:50 p.M. 12/4/15 a very clear sky on friday night. heard a couple teenagers outside my apartment being loud, decided to go see since i have a new car outside and i live in a pretty busy city..Went outside, on my porch on the third floor and watched the teens stand on the side of my car when realizing they weren't doing anything i decided to listen to them as they got louder in excitement and confusion. i looked up into the night sky and noticed a very big light in the distance that was brighter than any star or any aviation craft i have seen in my life. the object was still as if it were scanning the area. the object was out to the west and eventually started to move very slowly north after a few minutes. during this few minutes it did change from a white color from first being seen to a very distinctive purple color, during this few minutes it changed multiple colors from green to what appeared to be a light show of multiple colors of red, blue, green and purple, all with in a second. once it started going north, i videoed as much as i could until i couldn't see it no more(due to a roof of a neighboring house). at that time i stopped for a second and just thought what it could be. i then thought wait i may be able too see this from the back of my house. i went to the the other side of my house(which was on the other side of the neighboring house) and the object was there where it went west briefly and came back east toward me video.. now in the video on the back side of the house there was a tree outside my window where it appears in and out and almost blinking, it wasn't it was the branches of the tree making it appear that way. the object then started to go south again and rite before it did it turned to a big bright red in which it stayed that color the rest of the time. once it went south again i had to go back to the front of my house to continue to film. the last video is just over 30 seconds long when a plane out in the distance came into picture. and thats when the object kicked into gear and left the sky. after the object left there was a lot of activity in the air (planes flying) where all this took place. you can my reactions and emotions in the video as i tried my best to describe what was going on.
content.summary: Light hovering in the clear night sky changing colors

content.detailedDescription: Around 2am. summer time, my friend and i were at wintler park. at the columbia river, sitting on the sand and looking at the airport that is across the river. well out of no were an object from the east. it has bright, the color of the rainbow. very bright! it just came from the sky. it was triangular and and it spun around dealt fast.. it was so big and so close to the airport. we couldn't even react right away and and it was only for 3 seconds at the most and it disappeared to the west. never did we see it again.. we all waited the next day to see the news but nothing had to do with wat we saw.. it was at least 8,of us and we all saw it at the same time.. we still talk about it but have no idea what it was.
content.summary: Size of football field and triangler spun fast with bright colors!

content.detailedDescription: The first thing is my bf was walking in the woods near our house to the store he came to the end of the path from the woods onto the gravel road it was nine o clock pm it was june of 2014 it was a clear sky he saw a giant blk thing moving over his head triangle in shape moving very slow and low he watched it till it was out of sight with no noise at all ieufo is what he thought of it may be .It was triangle three white lights on each corner but he says he was so stuck from looking at this he could,t move cause it was amazing . he could,t believe it had no noise the size of it the shape and how low it was . it just moved slowly away till he could.T see it anymore .But since this may of 2015 he was walking the same path to the store three hours went by no sign of him it only takes 20 mins from our house to the store and bk . i was worried went looking could,t find him anywhere and i no which way he walks so on so he woke up at 50 feet away from where he had seen the in other words the triangle shape ufo he awoke too what he describes faces of people and a large crane his shirt was missing he got too his feet and the people he thought he had seen turned too trees and the large crane was gone . now me and my daughter was walking the same path we use this path a lot  well as i dropped my daughter off at school and was walking back i looked down and saw circle patterns with other rings in side the outer the ground was frozen over but the rings was warm too the touch i took my camera phone out and took s many as i could this just hap on dec 3 2015 would just love to have some answers the circles was 15 foot steps apart from one side too the other there were two of them and two trees had bark missing the trees were beside each other the limbs from a top the trees were laying on the ground .
content.summary: Walking through the woods it was triangle very large it made no noise we have three dif events going on with this same location

content.detailedDescription: My marine platoon was on a bevac in the desert mountains of camp pendleton when we noticed a white light in the western sky about 30 miles miles away. the object seem to notice us at the same time a with in a second was over us. the object was as big a grade school and quite as it hovered over us. the a green beam came over us all for about 3 minutes and very quickly the object shot over the ocean and left into the sky. this was followed by military jets and helicopters. the next morning a general came out and told us what we saw was a misfired missle from vanguard air base. we all known then that the government was in cover up mode.
content.summary: Hovered over my platoon then casted a green light then left

content.detailedDescription: In the back pictures of trees to your right. at the continental divide area
content.summary: Looked disc shape and did not move n 4 pictures while i was going 75mph

content.detailedDescription:
I was in edinburg texas off nolana loop at my friends house. we had got in our trucks to go pickup my enclosed trailer at  another friends house. while leaving the neighborhood a teenager at the end of the street stopped my friends truck and pointed up in the southern direction. at that point bother friends in their truck in front my vehicle started to watch the object the teen pointed out. i rolled down my truck window and watched also. the object was traveling south to north and appeared to be climbing in altitude. it appeared to have 3 circles in triangle shape emmiting a orange light from each circle..Like bright neon light. the night sky was very clear  and the shape of the object appeared to be triangle or v shaped. it traveled faster than a jet but slower than a falling star. its path was straight. as it seemed to pass almost directly above us when it paused, maybe for 5 seconds. the 3 circles on the underbelly of the craft became very bright and seemed to make a bright swirling burst . it instantly was gone.
 this was the first sighting i have had that i cannot explain. i live in and have grown up not far from nasa mission control and elington afb. we see jets and helicopters all the time. this sighting is nothing like anything i have ever seen. both of my friends also saw exactly the same thing and it has left all of asking what we saw. the only feeling ii remember feeling was amazement at what we were seeing.
content.summary: A stranger pointed out object and we watched it until it dissapeared.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: or one minute and gone the next it appeared to be following the bomber
content.summary: i was outside in my front yard saw the bombers flying overhead and noticed the green form

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen many ufos. this was the first one i have seen.
it was summer and a hot night in the desert of california. i was 10 years old i lived out side of ridgecrest ca. i was riding my bicycle to a friend's house down a dirt road.It was twilight the sun was down.I knew it would be pitch dark in an hour.I didn't have much time to get there and back.So i was riding as fast as i could up thee hill when i got to the top.I looked into the sky to see what i thought was the north star but it was to bright and seemed to be to low in the sky. suddenly the star began to change colors from bright blue and white and yellow. i came to a hult thinking wow that's cool the star is changing colors ? then it got really bright. añd streecked up into the sky straight above my head in about two seconds. there is nothing on the face of this earth that can do what it did.It moved over ten thousand. miles in a couple seconds. i almost fell off my bike.Now i was starring straight up in to the sky.It stopped on a dime.Sat motionless for a few seconds them disappeared like a backward falling star. it was gone.I was in awwh.I put my foot on the peddle and got ready to continue to my friends house.Then realized that it was dark already ? but how i thought? it was dusk just a minute ago? how did it get so dark i thought?. so i went back home instead of to my friends house. some how i was missing about a half hour of time and still can't explain it to this day.
i have many other encounters to share with you since this event has changed my life.I would love to talk to you further about this. and other sights that you may be interested in collecting evidence. please feel free to contact me with regards to this.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a friends house in newmains scotland,on the 10/12/2015.I went outside to have a cigarette at 1.15pm.Whilst outside smoking .Mt attention was drawn to wht i first thought was a large binliner/large bird,moving through the sky just to the right of the house.As i wathed this object,it tiltedat a 90 degree angle and moved forwards,each time it did this i could see,that it was black in colour underneath,and grey to blueish on the upper surface.Although i was still thinking this was some sort of large plastic bag,i could tell that the object wasnt being blown about in an erratic manner,and was travelling in a direct course and pattern.The sky was clouded in the backgroung,but not foreground,and these were of a pale white colour,as the object kept flipping on its angle the changes in colour against the clouds weere more apparent,and the gry/blueish upperside reflected more within the background of the clouds. it seemed to me that whilst moving,it was flipping and trying to rebalance itself against the upper head winds that were present,although thre wasnt any groung winds that i could make out,cloudy,but without rain.I watched this for 2-4 mins until it faded in the clouds and out of view.I shouted for my friend to come and see what i could see,but unfortunately by the time he had arrived outside and because of the clouds he was unable to observe this .
yours 
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Object was black underneath,and reflected a grey/blueish on topside surface

content.detailedDescription:
In 1978 i was 10 years old and living in secluded wooded area on the outskirts of the great smoky mountains in tennessee. i had just got home with my parents from a school board meeting. i belive it was in october but it may have been later in the year. i remember it being cold. we got home around 10 pm.

as soon as we got out of the car my mom pointed up in the sky and asked "what is that?" dad and i looked up and saw a large object (around 100 feet long and 30 to 40 feet wide) slowly gliding across the sky above our house. it made no noise at all, and had two large bright white lights at the front of the craft. it was bullet shaped, larger and rounder at the front, slimed slightly and curved out about 10 feet in the back. the very end was vertically flat. the lights in front were the only lights we could see. the entire craft was a dark gray.

as we watched my mom told me to go in the house and call my aunt who lived close to us and see if she could see it too. when i picked up the phone it had no dial tone. i hung up and tried again and there was still no dial tone. 

i went back outside and we watched the craft glide out of sight over the treetops. my parents and i went into the house and found the phone was working fine. (this was a time when phone lines were strung between poles instead of being buried.)

the entire sighting lasted about 3 minutes.
content.summary: Saw large ufo in 1978

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my two sons to school on october 30, 2015.  we had just pulled out of the driveway (still in our neighborhood) when my younger son (he's 10) says he sees an object flying back and forth faster than anything he has seen before.  we drive further ahead to a place where our view is less obstructed by trees and my older son (14) i both see the object.  it appears as a white cylinder.  we pull over and observe.  it goes back and forth at an extremely high rate of speed.  about 30 seconds after we first see it, two other similar objects join the first.  they make the same type of back and forth movements and the 3 objects form a triangle (not touching, but a triangular formation) and stay stationary for a few seconds then move quickly apart.  we could not tell how far away the objects were nor how big.  the moved faster than any aircraft i have ever seen and they were not balloons.  the could have possibly been drones, but again, the speed was something i haven't seen before.  at least one object stayed in the area until i returned from the school (approx 20 mins) and then moved out of sight at a more normal speed.
content.summary: Taking kids to school.  my youngest son (10) saw the object.  my older son (14) and i both observed the original object plus 2 others.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my girlfriend parking on north merritt island florida by nasa space center.  we were just outside of colony paryk trailer park where we both lived.  we parked my truck off the road cliose to a hill by an orange grove.  as we were in the truck a very bright light came down upon my truck and shined right in the passenger window.  it was so bright it made me feel kind of funny.   it really stunned both of us and kind of froze us sort of.  we were moving around in the truck trying to get out of there and then the light just vanished as fast as it came...
it really scarred both of us..
content.summary: Very bright light that came to the window of my vehicke
